content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code arrows50 for 50% off the original price or use the code arrows100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support the arrow earwarmer is a cozy textured accessory that combines warmth and style in one quick-to-make project featuring a bold arrow pattern this earwarmer is crafted using thick yarn allowing it to come together in no time at all its chunky design not only makes it an eye-catching piece but also ensures it keeps you toasty on those colder days perfect for crochet enthusiasts of all levels the arrow earwarmer is a fun fast project that delivers a stylish result with minimal effort this pattern is made in super bulky weight yarn with a 8mm hook i recommend choosing a natural or synthetic fiber not something plant based as that won t be as warm this earwarmer is worked flat in a stitch repeat that gives a ribbed rich texture you work it flat from bottom up and then seam the ends together this pattern is written for 3 sizes adult s m and l you can easily adjust the fit to your preference by adding or subtracting row and/or changing the stitch count size s should fit any kids above 10 the instructions will be shown like this s m l if there is only one number that is for all sizes this is a beginner friendly pattern it utilizes basic stitches and the stitch repeat is easy to memorize and work up it includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions **measurements** s 17 circumference and 3 75 width m 19 circumference and 4 width l 21 circumference and 4 25 width thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my amazing tester divavonpurl /people/divavonpurl this pattern wouldn t be possible without you
